extracted_playbook.title: Contact Authorities
extracted_playbook.description: Contact law enforcement, CISA, or Treasury immediately regarding any identified activity related to BeagleBoyz.

extracted_playbook.title: Incorporate IOCs into Detection Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Incorporate IOCs identified in CISAâ€™s Malware Analysis Reports into intrusion detection systems and security alert systems to enable active blocking or reporting of suspected malicious activity.
